regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = "Welcome to CYBERxNUKE ADD-ON" xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1) return

regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = " CYBERxNUKE " xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1) return

regex.name: url
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36

regex.name: URL
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests import re import base64
id = re.findall("javascript.*?id='(.*?)'", page_data)[0] url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream.php?id=' + id + '&width=640&height=480' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': 'http://wizhdsports.to/live/stream1.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers = headers) curl = re.findall('curl = "(.*?)"', source.text)[0] m3u8 = base64.b64decode(curl)
url2 = 'http://bro.adca.st/getToken.php' headers2 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': url, 'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'} source2 = requests.get(url2, headers = headers2) token = re.findall('"token":"(.*?)"', source2.text)[0]
return m3u8 + token + '|Referer=http://cdn.bro.adca.st/jwplayer.flash.swf&User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0'
